name: Fur-ever Retro
description:
Fur-ever Retro is a two-player platform fighting game based rather loosely on fairytale mythos. Collect and knock coins out of your opponent to win in this fast-paced party platformer styled after the single-screen multiplayer games of old.

The game was initially made as an unofficial "demake" of a group project I was part of. I made it in the span of a week over that Christmas without their knowledge for a bit of fun. Hilarious, I know.

(I don't like asking for money for such small things but I have a humble Uni student. If you can, please throw us a bone and donate! -Emily)
